content: difficult installation, doesn't work well once installed. installation and registration is a multi-step process which requires battery-draining changes to android phone. after installed the camera feed dropped within 15 minutes (my wi-fi) is perfect. attempting to return baby monitor and definitely deleting this app.
Good

This thing simply does not work. I've tried every connection possible, whether it be on WiFi or data. The camera never connects. I've contacted them twice and have basically been told it's a problem with my internet. Ridiculous.

How can you sell a monitoring system that either does not connect or disconnects constantly? I reset modem and the the camera with no effect. I am purchasing a new system from a better company so I know my babies are safe.
Amazing
Stopped connecting all of a sudden. Constant red light. Use to work fine but just stopped 2 nights ago.
I click on the app and it tried to start, but then it fails. I can never actually see what the camera sees.

Used to work fine, but now disconnects all the time, sometimes will not reconnect and there is often a weird purple tinge to the image. Also, why no 5ghz support? This is too expensive a camera to be using technology that's 5 years old.
Always having troubles with conection
Deleting and reinstalling the app worked in improving the video quality after the last firmware update. I'm happy again.
I received this a shower gift. Glad I didn't spend the money on it. Terrible connectivity issues.
Terrible app. You should be embarrassed.

Eats battery life even when not in use. My phone used to last all day, but after installing the app, it needs to be charged twice daily, and will eat 40 percent of the battery overnight even with the app closed and notifications turned off.
This system just losing conectivey or fails to connect on a constant basis. I wasted my money on this. This has been happening from the time i bought it until now and todY 8/24/20
Its so easy and convenient. It puts my mind at ease knowing literally were i may be i can see my little one and know my child is ok

I've owned this monitor for a year now and its awful. I have no issues with my wifi but it keeps telling me baby monitor is offline. I'll have the app with sound running in the background and it will suddently disconnect and I have to open the app to get it going again. I spend so much time checking the app to make sure that its hasn't disconnect otherwise i dont know what's going until my child crying bloody murder. I wish I had picked a different baby monitor.
I loved this camera but the past two updates seem to have trashed the quality. The audio works but the video is extremely pixelated regardless of the settings/uninstalling etc.

Well, for starters my phone is blowing up with notifications and you can't even see anything from the app. Just a blurry screen of the room. Fails to connect everytime over the last few days. Reinstalled the app and it still doesn't show a clear picture, or have any sound what so ever.

Worst app ever.. keeps disconnecting and the app just shuts off. Spend your money on something else... Update August 5th: apparently there were connectivity issues at the end of July but my cameras still do not connect properly! All 3 of my cameras are offline. There are no issues with my wifi at all!

Recently, this app has become very buggy. Throughout the day, for the past few days, I have had so many disconnects. I came to read the reviews, and I see several others recently started having the same issues. Update: Aug 5th, the app seems to be working properly now. Updated to four stars.

Unreliable. Difficult to connect, even with excellent wifi. Sound doesn't always work. But the deal breaker for me is that the unit goes from standby to online by itself. This has happened multiple times over several weeks. Who is watching and why? Creeps me out. This was a gift and is going back to the store. This would be a one star review, but the picture quality (on the rare chance I can actually connect) is excellent, so that is a positive.

Have had this camera a while. Its always been slow to connect. Recently it doesn't connect at all. The developer says they had an issue that was resolved around July 27 but it's August 4 and it still doesn't connect. My wifi can run 2 Netflix accounts, fortnite online, and have multiple devices browsing the internet at one time no problem. Even the cheapest worst video quality camera is better if it atleast connects reliably. This device has major issues with connectivity.

Worked great for a couple months. Stopped working with the last couple updates. Super disappointed. It spends all night disconnecting and reconnecting. I've tried everything at this point. My phone and the app are up to date... I'm about to buy brand another monitor.... Edit* no it isn't Saftey 1st, this doesn't solve my issue. My issue is the app doesn't work properly so I now how no way of installing the camera and this is after 4 or 5 days of trying to get ahold of your customer service.
All problems have been resolved. Good camera.
I got an email from the diagnostic team telling me how to fix the problem and everything is now working! Thanks!

Recent update must have killed connectivity because now my camera fails to connect constantly and hasn't been functioning for days. A critical device for monitoring our baby and it is extremely unreliable.

Hit and miss. If it does connect, it takes a few minutes. Most of the time the product fails to connect, freezes or goes offline for no reason. The smart audio unit has never worked and the customer care team never sent a new one after speaking with them. Very disappointing. Update: Customer support contacted us and we were able to reset everything and it currently works. Time will tell if it continues to work or if it goes back to disconnecting.
It never wants to connect. I thought it was my internet and it's the camera. What's the point on having a camera to keep an eye on your baby if it doesn't connect 😡🤬😡🤬

This camera is terrible. It constantly disconnects overnight (my wifi has no issues). Now for the past two days the camera won't connect at all. I tried literally everything: resetting, removing the camera to re-pair (says offline and won't re-pair), I uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Nothing works. I even opened a brand new unit since I have two and that one does the same thing! Customer care isn't available, made me leave a message. For a $200 product this is unacceptable.
Ever since the update the camera fails to connect.
Terrible app, can't log in, just spins loading wheel. Unusable.
I have had nothing but issues with it NEVER connecting to my phone or freezing. I do NOT recommend this to anyone! I cannot trust this product!

This product rarely works and the "customer support" is virtually nonexistent. It is completely unethical and possibly illegal of the company to sell goods that they surely know by now do not work as advertised. It is morally reprehensible of this company to do so to parents trying to care for their young children.
Always freezing and disconnects, wish we would have went with a different monitor.

Edit: 7/25/20. Once again, this worked well for awhile, now all of a sudden only I can turn on/off standby for us total 3 users but with a sudden glitch of it going on and offline randomly, I tried logging out and logging in and uninstalling app, and re adding the camera and now I can't even log into my account. So frustrating when something so important decides to go down FOR DAYS and I bet this will last for 2 months like the last issue.
This new update is terrible! It was already an issue with connectivity now it does not even log the baby moments
Constant connections issues. And it's not my internet
The connection is terrible.

Terrible! Connection always spotty lately -- can't get video or audio up at all. Tried uninstalling app, restarting my phone, unplugging devices, nothing works. My internet and wifi connection is great but app won't let me view or listen. Wondering if they need to update the app. Not good for something parents rely on

It is unfortunate that I can't trust this monitor. Today is day 3 of not being able to connect. I've restarted my phone, I've forced stopped the app, I've checked for new updates and nothing. Last week it kept freezing in the middle of the night...hoping my baby didn't wake up and cry himself to sleep. It has happened at least 4 times within a 10 month period.
Poor connection

Worst app ever lately. Always has trouble connecting. I know it's not my internet because everything else on my network works fine. Please fix this so I can sleep at night again and not have to worry about not hearing my baby.

I spend more time trying to connect to this monitor then I do actually using it. Constantly disconnects and freezes. Not reliable at all. Ready to ditch this and find something else so I can view my child in real time and not wait 5 minutes for a connection
Good

I wanted to love this monitor, but I've come to hate it. It does not connect on a regular basis or loses connection partway through a viewing. I need something reliable to be able to watch our son, but I don't trust that this monitor. For the price we paid, I would have expected a much better product.

I'd love to give 5 but the video keep getting shut off and blur. It is keep doing it more often now. O don't know because of he camera or the signal. But I did try the troubleshoot. But it still doing it. I love Safety 1st and I have the auto close door from them, camera, baby monitor and toy. Even baby on board sign in the car.
Can't ever connect. Issue is on both wifi and mobile network
It won't connect very often after the new update. Unplug, replug. Sometimes it works. Video quality is good though.... If we can watch it.

The app was pretty unreliable before, but with the newest update, they've somehow managed to make it even worse. Now it can't even stay connected to the camera. It reconnects every 3 mins, and sometimes can't even do that.

This app never ever works. I try and keep it on in the middle of the night amd it will disconnect and i will have no idea my baby is crying. I had to go out and buy a new baby monitor because this on never works. The once month that it does work its great but its such a rare and it only keeps getting worse and worse.

Uses more than 1% of battery per minute the app is in use. Compared with onvifer (ip camera app) which uses 1% per 10 minutes of use. There is no excuse to be 10x worse at battery management. This app is so awful it used 11% of my battery in a few hours without even being opened! I would not recommend the app.
Setting for motion are very picky
Audio unit didn't work, but camera is great and setup was easy via the app. Not much information in the Help or FAQs, but you shouldn't need it.
Tells me to update the firmware of the camera when it is already up to date and wont let me view the monitor. Was working fine before the last may update

*EDIT: they seem to have updated and done a complete overhaul on their app. It has begun to work again and works flawlessly, better than it initially did so I am happy with the product.* This was a great cam when I initially got it a year ago. I don't think it's connected once in the last month... I am beyond frustrated that I have paid over $100 for a product that I literally can't even use anymore. I would highly recommend saving your money here and invest in another company's product..

This system is truly awful. It will not stay connected. No issue with my internet. The issue lies solely within this terrible system. Images won't load, constant disconnection, jumpy video, ridiculous audio delay, now the camera won't even connect to wifi. This was as absolute waste of money. Do not, under any circumstances, buy this product. Ever.
I love your products.

I wanted to love this app and monitor sooo bad.. but especially with the update I've had a lot of issues. The camera is constantly reconnecting. Theres been countless times I've heard my baby cry from the other room while the monitor is completely silent with no notifications/trying reconnect. It never ends up connecting unless I completely close out the app, restart or reinstall the app. Im part deaf so it's extremely important that this works continuously. Save ur money
It was great until they updated the app and now we can't access any footage
Wouldnt connect I called the customer service number it really didnt help I just end up returning and getting the Infant optics one and its not wifi based which I think is better.
When it works, it works good. With latest update, cannot connect to baby monitor.
Since the update i can't turn the camera off when not in use unless I unplug it everytime
Constant problems with connection and I have great internet at home. Unreliable and would not recommend

I extremely upset right now. Since the app auto updated to the new version couple of days ago the baby camera keeps disconnecting every few seconds i have to be restarting the app for it to reconnect. The app does not stay connected to the camera for long.

This was working great until this last update. Now the the camera won't even connect to my android phone or tablet... This defeats the whole purpose of monitoring my child. I had multiple sleepless nights worrying about not being able to see my daughter in the middle of the night and constantly trying to reconnect. I had to purchase a new baby monitor to make sure I don't miss anything happening while she's in her room.
Liked the old verison before this new update. Lots if empty space.
Can we get night mode back? The new update makes everything bright white.
Excellent update 👍

This is a wifi based product and even with great wifi it takes forever to load the image if it even loads. The picture quality isnt great especially for how much you pay for the monitor. When your child is sleeping you want to be able to check on them and make sure everything is okay, not panic when its "loading" and all you can see is an empty crib. The sound isnt great and has a bad delay. This needs A LOT of work would NOT recommend!

Been terrible since day one. Connecting is a fifty fifty shot. Hard close and try again and magicly it could start working. Disconnecting without notification so you end up ignoring baby by accident. Focus on points that don't make sense with no control of it (very clear curtain rod in the bottom left of the screen with blur baby in the middle). Just buy a different camera, and return this product if you just picked it up. Edit:Now you've gone and turned it all white? Are you kidding?

The app is really glitchy on my android phone and my wife's iphone. Also, for some reason, a family member who was connected to the wifi network could hear the sound from the baby because the monitor connected via bluetooth to her headphones. This family member does not have the app or the login so it is very concerning that she was able to hear what was coming through the monitor.
Can't connect to camera. Don't waste your money.

Stuck, goes off line. And now just froze on a last place it say. So tired of trying to get it to work. A big waste of money if I cant check in on my home or see who comes through a door. What's the purpose glad my grandbaby life is not dependent on this product. Glad I choose to test it first.

I wouldn't recommend this monitor for any family. My wife and I have had it for 7 months. After attempting to connect several times we was successful once. Then, once we disconnected since it was still early stages 1-3 months and our baby was in our care at all times, we never successfully reconnected. We a have 200 mdps and it's only 2 adults in the house that streams on one TV. I've disconnected VPN on my phone as recommended, connected to the 2.4ghz and it still gives me errors.

Listen - the $ tag is robbery - the user friendly interphase is a disaster - i saved the worst part for the end... count to 15 Mississippi before you see an event happen on the cam. What in the world are you as an app developer & company doing right? Are you using these commentaries as constructive criticism? If not than I hope you get bankrupt. EPIC FAIL all around guys - get it together.
App freezes, too sensitive to noise, zoom function gets stuck and cant see baby

This use to work wonderfully but lately will not connect to camera on my android. My daughter just started sleeping by herself again and I need to do school work but I can't because I don't have the peace of mind of getting to watch her.

I love the product and app when it works but the app does not reliably connect with the camera consistently. This is frustrating as I can't see my baby when I need to. The audio box does not work for me too. Can the developers do something about it?
Worst monitor ever. It constantly disconnects, and most times it takes up to an hour to reconnect again. It's useless, unreliable, and I would never recommend this product to anyone.

Why is it so difficult to connect with the camera? This just started recently. I'm on Android and my husband on iOS and we both used to love the app and baby monitor. Then the app was upgraded on iOS and has been working wonderful for him. But since this upgrade it's been terrible for me when I can't connect to the camera to keep an eye on my baby. I don't understand what's the issue here? I've already tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app but I still have a hard time connecting to monitor
O stars. This camera does not not stay connected and the audio box doesnt work either. Sending back ASAP!
Awesome! If it doesn't disconnect.

I wanted so much to love this monitor. My husband often works out of town, so we bought this monitor thinking he would be able to check in on her when he was away. The concept is a great one but very poor execution. First, there is a BRIGHT blue light on the monitor that lights up the entire room. When my LO wakes up at night, she will stare right at the camera. Just make the light red? It is ALWAYS disconnecting. And beeps in the room when it connects and disconnects!! Do not recommend!!
Love this baby monitor, the only thing that I wish it did was keep the recorded videos longer then 24 hours before it deletes

I DID like this when it actually worked. The last week we havent been able to connect to camera - it just spins. Have tried uninstalling and reinstalling - no luck. Every other wifi app working just fine.
I cannot figure out how to turn the app off if i go away for the weekend. Is the only way to turn off all these notifications to unplug it? It's super annoying, please help!

When I try to play other videos or audio, even with the app closed, it will open and try to play the videos or songs thru this app. Even tho it's not the default player. No settings help at all. Have uninstalled/reinstalled. And have texted your hot line within hours a d got no reply

I fear the actual reliability and safety of all their other products on the market. Monitor and app not designed factoring the baby. it often goes offline for no reason and wakes the baby with flashing lights and chimes. I would not recommend this product, there are too many basic issues that have been overlooked.

Since the most recent software update, the app has gotten much better. The resolution and sensitivity are great, and now the app is more stable than before. Occasionally will glitch out and stay fully zoomed in, but a force restart fixes that. My only issues these days are more hardware focused - night vision has a high pitched hum from the camera, small recessed USB power port.
Baby monitor works only about half the time and currently hasn't worked for two days.
Awesome when it decides to connect. Just did the survey for your beta program and am super confused. Does this mean you're reworking the app? We just want connectivity.

The app rarely works to connect to the camera. Both our devices are new & up to date and our internet connection is the strongest we can get. Reinstalling it over and over over the last couple of months has been exhausting. We will sadly be purchasing a different camera as this app has proven to be unreliable time after time for the last 9 months. We will not be recommending this product.

Get something else. This is unreliable and disconnects and needs reinstalled all the time. Can't connect to the cams most of the time, lags alot, and since the problem its had for 2 months that they won't admit there is, i haven't even been able to reinstall them. "Missing parameter: username" is the constant error now. Going to go with another brand. Dont waste your money!

The Camera works ok once you can connect with it. It doesn't stay connected for more than a few days. Also the 2 way audio works until you try to talk through the mic. on the app. Then the sound stops working.
I love this monitor! I bought this for my mom who is a senior to check on her. This is good if you can not afford to buy a home secruity system.
Just installed the app and camera and so far so good. We love the setup!
Camera not connecting.... says "Connecting to camera..." but never does.
Camera never freaking works

I haven't been able to connect to the camera in months. I hoped the latest update would solve this so I reinstalled the app, but the camera continues to display the loading circle with "connecting to camera...". It doesn't matter if I'm on wifi or data, I've tried removing and re-adding the camera, reinstalling the app, I've changed the video quality, nothing works. It's a good camera and I have no access to it. Don't buy safety 1st if you want to be able to see the video...
Can't connect to the camera at the best of times. Absolutly useless app with no soft reset options to fix the buggy connectivity
Unable to install/use with my network or my phone. Got help twice and no better
Buggy
No 5G wifi support.

Display freezes at least once a day, problem exists across multiple devices. Camera will also get stuck fully zoomed in randomly. Camera doesn't reset with button. Update: it now fails to connect to WiFi and resetting doesn't work. Now stuck with error " missing parameter: username". There is no fix I can find for this issue.

The app video stream constantly freezes until I restart the app twice, or sometimes I have to reboot the camera. It often has troubles connecting to the camera or may take a long time (this is not a wifi issue as we're only in a townhouse and have 2 wifi boosters). You used to be able to tap the video stream to turn the camera on/off but somehow that stopped and now the camera won't turn off unless I unplug it... so now we constantly have to turn the camera to face the wall when not in use.

Very unreliable the connection on the lower wifi frequency is a joke. When it works its ok will never work on very high setting camera does whatever it wants to regardless of wifi. I have top of the line internet it a city area. Would not recomend to anyone. Oh yea and the so called support.. Non existant havent been able to ever reach someone. JOKE cant believe I paid all this money.
Good camera quality! Has options for two-way microphone and to have the night vision turn on automatically in dim light.
Was pretty good until the update took away the turn on and off feature. Now I have physically unplug and if I'm not home or close by, its very inconvenient.

Functional but missing certain features that would make it better. Ex: switching from wifi to mobile without having to restart the app, being able to remove members, auto night vision working properly Currently monitor just fades to black when android device is using mobile data making it unusable.

I've tried so many times to set this camera up and at the end I keep getting an error message stating missing parameter: username. I have entered everything the way it says on the instructions as well as on the videos I've watched...and nothing. So I reached out to customer service...and after stating the issue, I got a response asking how can I help? So I respond with the same question....crickets!!!!!! I'm sure someone will respond now that I've given a 1 star..if not I'm returning it!
I LOVE THIS APP!!!!

Terrible experience. The camera ALWAYS has a hard time connecting to my cell phone and tablet. I've reset it more times than I can remember.... After installing and reinstalling the camera COUNTLESS times, I am returning it through Amazon. I couldn't be more disappointed with this camera. (I initially gave it 2 stars and edited it to 1 star after contacting technical support, doing what they asked, and still having a terrible experience).

I've had this monitor for a year and I've had problems with it off and on throughout the whole time. We went about 3 months with no issues and then it stopped connecting, couldn't turn it off without unplugging it. It's very frustrating because I like the monitor when it's working but because of all the issues I would not recommend this to another mom. I finally just got a cheap monitor from Target and it works every time, no issues. Really disappointed in this product, I had high hopes for it.
None of the options work. No turning off background noise or muting. Cant get it to turn on half the time

There are definitely places for huge improvement for this app. Prior to the latest update I was able to turn off the streaming when it's not in use, for some reason I no longer am able to do that. I now have to unplug it to turn it off and plug it back in when I need to use it. Which btw, does not "connect" right away when I plug it back in, I have to push the button on the top. The video and audio haven't been bad. Decent quality. Not the worst monitor, but far from the best.

I am so sick of dealing with this monitor. I wish I could get my money back and buy something that works. What's the point of having a baby monitor that occasionally works. It needs to work EVERY SINGLE NIGHT, not 2 nights out of the week. I've reset it, reset my WiFi, restarted my phone, made sure everything is up to date and guess what.. still not working. Hope my daughter is okay, because I can't see her.

I first got the camera I loved it! Worked great but about 3 months into using it the sound box wouldn't work anymore.( tried factory reset and all the things customer service said to do)ok that stinks but atleast the camera still worked right! Well the past week or so it has been giving me issues not wanting to stay connected and now it wont turn off anymore by the app like I use to be able to do so I have to unplug and replug it in everyday and not wanting to connect unless I hit button on top.

This app used to work pretty well for us. Recently it has been deleting recorded events even though we are notified that there are recorded events available to view! What's the point if I can't see recorded events! Really disappointing!

I connected 1 monitor an had no problem now when I decided to connect another one its saying missing parameter "username" any advice? Update 1/21/20 after contacting customer service we resolved the issue an I'm a happy customer 👍🏽👍🏽 app and all 3 cameras work excellent.
Does really well picture is clear!! Great Monitor sometimes it takes a couple seconds to connect but its probably the my internet speed

Only reason it gets one star is so I can post this. This is the worst baby monitor I have ever dealt with!! The audio until hardly ever connects and it's now not turning on. Safety 1st also wont do anything to replace a defective product. They just tell us it's our internet connection. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS FOR A RELIABLE BABY MONITOR!!!! I have no way to ever hear my baby in the middle of the night and shes on the opposite side of the house from me, not very settling as a first time mom.
Overall good! Sometimes it needs to be restarted. Acts a lil sketchy sometimes but for the most part it's good!

Camera has great quality for our baby needs. However, the camera freezes frequently on my note 8. Audio monitoring seems to cut in and out as well. I have to restart the app every 15 minutes or so to get camera back up and running. Hopefully this will be addressed in next update.
Its gives me peace of mind. I'm glad I bought it

Recorded "events" disappear and/or are inaccessible. For example, it'll say we have 85 recorded events, but when we tap on the filmstrip to view them, they all disappear and then it says we have "no recorded events" or it won't allow us to scroll passed the first few to access earlier events. Really frustrating! It makes the app useless other than for live viewing. This happens on my phone and my husband's.
Bad
I love it. Helps me to check my baby boy. I feel confident
Awesome!
Despite repeated attempts to get this to work, I was unable to get it to pair. The delay to start video on the phone is several minutes. Completely useless as a baby monitor. Returning to the store.

The Monitoring app works most of the time, however the last 24hrs it's feed lagging and freezing. Monitoring my child has been more difficult. When the stream freezes and I have no idea what is happening hasn't been okay. Also I updated the app thinking an update would help with the issue but now my app hasn't successfully connected with the camera since. I see the event video clips (which won't play by the way) but no live stream at all. Even after several restarts. What's going on?

The app is fiddly. Sometimes streaming in the background works sometimes it doesn't. Sometimes it will connect without issue to the camera sometime not. Also there is no option to turn cell data on or off. It would also be great to have a picture on picture mode where I can still stream video while I used other apps similar to YouTube's picture in picture mode.
Camera and app worked great for the first 1.5 weeks, now I can never connect to the camera... and if I can it will disconnect an hour later. Would've never bought it knowing this!!!!

At first we were impressed with this audio and video unit but the connections issues have been pretty bad for a few months now. The units lose connection often and our wifi is very stable. I have been woken up by hearing my baby cry in his room before I hear it or get notified by the unit or phone. The light on the unit does not turn off like it should with update either so baby's room is illuminated constantly. Please fix. Expensive unit for all these bugs.
New features appreciated, however, the startup chime is so loud, it can't be restarted when baby is sleeping, which is required because the networking stack isn't the best.
High quality camera!! Also love that I can watch the monitor on my phone where ever I am!
Most recent update has broken camera streaming on iOS and Android. CANNOT even connect 90% of time after this update. Tried resetting everything on my network to no avail.
Its great.. but the only thing...it goes offline during the nights which is a thumbs down for us.. need improvements
I love it
Really good quality. Picture is very clear. Works good for home security use as well when away. Alerts are not delayed. Recommended for sure to anyone.

I've just tried and compared 6 different (Safety 1st, iBaby, Motorola, Kodak, Lollipop, Arlo Baby) wifi baby monitors and found that only Safety 1st send a proper Push Notification when the camera goes offline/online which is a must have for me. Thank you to the product managers & developers for building this essential feature. This system also has the best video & audio quality I've seen which is quite nice, and I love that it has an old-school audio parent unit so I don't need to set up the app on the babysitter's phone. The biggest issue I've run into is that the Android app uses A LOT of batter, even while it's not open. My Pixel 3 reports that 40% of my phone battery is used by the app - it's so frustrating. Please look into it and reach out if you need more input from me.
This one us terrible. The sound machine didn't work from the beginning. The two way talk dosen't work. The app randomly shuts down so you can't hear your baby.

My biggest problem is the front blue light being on all the time. I was excited when there was an update to turn it off, however, although switched off on both mine and my husband's apps, the blue light remains on.

Love stream won't load. Audio puck doesn't work and cannot do a factory reset. Seems like an hardware issue with the audio puck and a software issue with the live stream video. Having issues with both hardware and software in different areas of the product doesn't instil confidence in a product that is supposed to monitor a newborn. Tried on both a pixel XL and iPhone 8. Going to return

This has to be the worst camera system ever. The app constantly freezes, the sound only works half the time. Most the time I can't trust if it is working because there have been too many times the app didnt reflect any movement or sound when my baby was crying. Please don't waste your money on this camera, it is not reliable.

Worked decently in the beginning but now freezes on the opening screen nearly every time. Once past there it will likely freeze at some later point as well. The app is Garbage. (Same experience across multiple phones & brands)
Not bad does lag a bit
Connection issues. What good is a baby monitor if you can't see live feed because it won't connect to your phone. Frustrating

Your cameras always lose connection and it's not my network because nothing else in my home has this problem plus my smart audio unit always stops working this is the second camera to do this so I will not buy any more of your useless items
The app continually freezes and loses connection. It doesn't close out on my phone, just continually runs in the background, so I have to restart my phone to turn it off.
Needs updated but won't update. Connection spotty. Won't connect when needed. When it does actually work its few and far between but a good product. Fix this update!!!!

It's been working great until today. All of a sudden it stopped working properly. It keeps saying I need a firmware update and I get to select either update now or update later. If I select update now it crashes. If I select update later it goes back to home screen and says can't do live stream until update is done. I've tried and tried. I sent feedback and haven't received a response. I uninstalled and reinstalled and still same issue. I need to see my baby.
Awesome

App is glitchy and right now as I try to update it, it keeps shutting down so I can't see a live feed nor recorded sessions because it needs to be updated. Very frustrating and wish I didn't buy this baby monitor!

Uninstalled and redownloaded. Still when trying to access live stream the app says it requires an update. Click update... app fails 10 out of 10 times. Now we have a useless camera looking ornament above our babies crib. Used to work ok btw.
Terrible!!!!! Always disconnects and takes forever to reconnect to the camera. Often goes off wifi all on its own! So frustrating!!!

Constantly disconnecting. And my puck stopped working after 2 months. With the cost of this monitor, I shouldn't be having these problems. Now I have to worry about it disconnecting while I'm sleeping. Definitely wouldn't recommend.
Awesome product easy to install and easy to use I definitely recommend this product
First the picture wouldn't load then it's no longer recording/videos won't load. Waste of money
Very bad product! It does not even meet 1% of the intend.
just goy it set up and itd doing a great job, just a bit slow hooking up to the camera. Excellent visability. Easy to set up and use. worth time and money

Purchased from store upon setting up it told me the monitor was already activated. Called,texted and emailed with no support.....don't waste your time or money. If product support is this terrible I'm afraid to purchase any safety first product...sorry I'm not sorry stay away from this company.

Warning: RETURN THIS MONITOR IMMEDIATELY IF YOU CAN-- often looses connection which is completely unacceptable for a device intended to monitor your baby. I can't even tell when I've lost connection. Sometimes I'll realize I haven't heard my baby in a moment and then notice the camera has gone down! Instead of peace of mind I am constantly stressing about loosing connection and not realizing! I would buy a new one but hundreds were spent on this. If you can-- RETURN THIS IMMEDIATELY!
Just downloaded app and not working

The app crashes every day one way or another. It tries to restart itself (fine) but makes loud dinging noise that wakes up my baby. I have to unplug it and replug every so often because the recorded videos all say "still loading" even hours later and doesn't allow you to see what your baby did to set it off. It's a $200 monitor! How can it have more issues than my other $40 one!

Worthless. Wish I could get money back. Works when no one home and doesnt work when you need it to. DO NOT BUY. 30 DOLLAR WIFI CAM WORKS BETTER THAN THIS GARBAGE. How this company is still in business baffles me. Did you even test the camera before you put in on the market? Doubtful or maybe you would of fixed any of the numerous obvious flaws with this device. Horrible app, few options, and dumb camera to base station operation. Not that any of that matters because the camera wont stay online.

Purchased 2 units. Never managed to connect smart audio unit to either of the cameras (I'm a web developer and IT consultant) Still made it work, I live in the DR, so VPN needed for updates (only works in US and Can otherwise) still to expensive for minimum to none customer care.

Unreliable. Returning it ASAP. You will lose more sleep by having this product because you will be worried constantly whether it is actually working or not. On several occasions this "monitor" would show my kid fast asleep but in reality he was crying, for god knows how long. This product should be taken off the market.

This app is the worst ever so disappointed, I am returning asap!!!!!!!! Cam stop working. I went in my baby room to to only find out he was crying. This app always takes long to connect and now with the updates nothing working. Don't take that risk until your cam stop working and it will be to late to return back. Save your money definitely not worth it. I have two other cams I had to get and they connected fast and with no problem at all. That's how this app should be working but not!

I have been super disappointed with this product. We originally got this monitor because my husband works nights so it was a way for him to check in. However, after 2 monitors we decided to cut our losses. The audio struggles to say connected, disconnecting several times in an hour and for minutes at a time. The second monitor we received the parent unit stopped connecting all together, just with our first one. I have had more luck with our cheap Walmart monitor and find if more reliable.
it was great when it was working but now every time I try to go to the app it tells me the Monitor is off line and wont stream or record! what gives?

safety hazard. camera/app freezes. i was watching my preemie twins on my phone and all was well, or so i thought. i got up to use the bathroom and one of them was on his back, covered in vomit and not able to breathe. i rushed him to the hospital where he was admitted for 5 days thanks to aspirating on vomit. when i got home, the camera/app still showed him laying in bed safely. after watching closely it freezes several times an hour. i stopped using it. you could put an analog clock in view too

The app works most of the time, but is not the most reliable. The camera is very sensitive when it comes to noise, because it picks up every little sounds no matter how quiet (which isn't a bad thing). Notifications go off constantly, even when there's no one in the room, rendering that feature useless. I recommend using this app when you're at your house and awake. The sound does turn off sometimes, so you do have to check every now and then if your app's sound is working.
works when I feels like it loses connection constantly wont connect thing is garbage
PARENTS WORST NIGHTMARE. CAMERA FREEZES, LOSES CONNECTION, AND SOUND SUCKS. do not buy do not buy

honestly would not have bought this if I wouldve known it would just a pain to keep fixing... always goes on & offline. wont give us sounds of the baby unless you're on the app and minimize it. no one will be home and itll send us notifications on motion and noise grant I have it on the lowest setting. it is seriously a waste of time and your money... plus if the baby is crying you wont be able to hear it until 2-3 seconds later..

App is garbage. Cant turn off audio from camera. App wont see network on Android 8.1 phone. No way to record to phone unless motion sense is turned on. And theres more issues. This whole system belongs in some amateur night contest where it would shine. In fact that would be the only place this would be successful. On the app, theres no control to flip the video if the camera needs to be mounted from a ceiling for instance. Theres no system information screen where it shows the cameras IP.

Dont do it. This was the worst $200 I could have ever spent. tells me it heres noise 24/7 even when I am not home. also In the middle of the night it decides to stop working and I find out by hearing my baby screaming. Then I have to reboot camera to get it working and it wakes the baby with an obnoxious screeching noise. This camera is the most useless thing they could have ever created. Extremely aggravated I even bothered buying this garbage. Wish I could give it negative stars!!!!!
goes offline way too often, and I hear the baby crying from the room before hearing it from the monitor.

It's unbelievable how long it takes to connect to the camera. It would be faster to walk to the baby's room (seriously). The app even asks permission to run in the background, but if you leave the app for one second, it drops everything and has to start over when you go back.

worst 200$ spent. i thought it would be great to be able to see and hear my baby on my phone but all it does is sends me notifications that there was noise. i hear my baby cry and get up so maybe its just lagging and will come through on my phone but im not letting my baby cry so i can find out. definitely returning it cuz i hate it.
Live streaming does take a while to come up, but works great..
Love the app and love the product. works great for me and my family
great monitor, great app to go with it!
Awesome app
Camera quality good...BUT Always disconnecting and sound cuts out. Needs an update... Can't hear baby cry....what good is it if cant HEAR!!! WORST 200 BUCKS IVE EVER SPENT!

For $200, this is not worth it. We never have issues with our wifi and things being connected to it. All we have are problems with it. I shouldn't have to constantly check and refresh the camera to know if it's working. Half the time it connects and disconnects without letting you know. Safety 1st Baby Monitor? Obviously not. If your app worked, I wouldn't worry about her safety. Especially at night.
I love that I can say goodnight to my grandbaby from a different province or country. And she loves when she hears my voice at night
kept lagging, and everytime it wants to update i cant use my monitors for days at a time. already looking to buy another monitor. save your money and buy something better
it's an adjustment learning experience..I use it for my husband in case he needs me at night, but I can't figure it out how to turn down the notices but yet still be able to hear my husband
Disconnects all the time! The app sucks and the sound is always cutting out. It's getting returned tomorrow, not worth the money.

this is the best baby monitoring system you could ever buy. I just downloaded the app, plugged in the camera & go about my day all while my grandson sleep peacefully. An alert is sent to my phone informing me of any sound or movement he makes. Absolutely amazing! So fast and easy to install with guaranteed positive results. I highly recommend this for anybody and everybody who have children. Very satisfying knowing while he's sleeping Im cooking his dinner & watching over him at the same time.😍

I love having a video monitor as well as the traditional audio baby monitor to watch my baby at night. we have used it every day for over 1 month now. I use it on my iPad and have it on all night, every night. it gives me piece of mind knowing I can see my baby at all times. It is not a perfect app & can be finicky at times to connect the camera to my audio unit and device, but it works for my family. I like the options to set notifications for movement and audio.

as long as you have a very strong internet connection, this is a decent setup with sound and mostly black and white video.. once in a while its color, but it needs to be very bright in the room for color viewing.
Disconnects all the time.
Love the view! Clean & crisp reception. Thanks!
Works perfectly, no issues. Records and alerts you of every motion and noise. Love it!
does not connect...very disappointed in this product and app
works great!

Terrible disconnects all the time! Instructions are barely coherent. save yourself the money and dont buy!!
there pretty tight for what there made for but for the price i feel very disapointed they should be way better
app crashes and laggs so many times. half the time it wont even catch us going into or out of her room to put her down.
app is terrible lags, freezes and runs when you shut it down

this app lags so bad. i can hear my baby wake up before the monitor even makes a sound. also it crashes all the time. pretty ridiculous for a 200 dollar monitor!! child safety is NOT SOMETHING TO MESS AROUND WITH. FIX YOUR APP.

App is horribly designed for set up. So many glitches and errors. The trouble shooting videos are pointless cause they only show you what to do when the app is working like its supposed to, not when you need top troubleshoot a problem. Once it's working I'm crossing my fingers that it's smooth
it keeps telling me to update and i have already done so

terrible amount of time spent trying to connect to the app. If any of the 3 emails I've sent to the makers of this product get answered I'll be shocked! Great idea of a product but doesn't connect with a best wifi signal you could have in one's house. Very frustrating!!!
I like the camera when it actually connects to the app. I spend way too much time trying to reconnect it. Hope they can stop the glitches, waiting to hear back.

The only pro is that the image quality is good. Cons - we have a child that came home on O2 and we were hoping for the camera to be reliable and capture moments that we could go back to review and so far has failed to do so. It will record every 2 minutes the noise from his compressor during the day, but has failed to capture every major moment at night. It disconnects frequently and is unreliable. Will be looking for something else.

Constantly going offline and disconnecting, and now the app is crashing all the time!! After paying over $200 for this monitor it seems I will likely have to go buy something else so I can actually keep an eye on my baby when she sleeps! BUYER BEWARE!!

Awful!!! Keeps disconnecting and we have to restart a million times a day!!!! now i have to buy another monitor after spending almost $200 on this garbage. App is a POS. I get no sleep knowing that the App freezes while trying to have my baby sleep in her own room bc I can't hear her cry.
terrible.. only worked twice now the app has been saying conecting to camera for hours
no good so easy my ass and when you ask for help nothing i will never buy nothing saftey first again always was and always will be no good
good. just having difficulty hooking up but they got back to me the next day so seems like I'll figure it out soon
Amazing quality I think that that could be a little better
The quality is great, the sound is too! Had to mess with it to get it not to stop streaming live when phone goes to sleep. 👍👍
disconnects constantly. last night my baby was screaming and it was disconnected I couldn't hear him. so disappointed in this app.
works very well. Very easy setup process.

SO many issues with this product! It no longer records baby moments, but gives us tons and tons of notifications to tell us the audio unit is fully charged (we leave it plugged in, so we shouldn't be getting them constantly...?). Also, we turned off the phone notifications for noise and movement because we got too many false alerts, so now we can't even use that feature.

wow, I have been using this for nearly two months and am about ready to buy a different monitor. the app crashes, usually several times when trying to use it. and the camera takes forever to load the streaming feed, and will freeze up sometimes with the picture saying it is streaming but it isn't, the image is still. I realized this because I HEARD my baby crying from the other room but the camera showed a perfectly still and sleeping baby. So this is unreliable and incredibly frustrating.
The app refuses to connect to camera at night. all day long it works fine, and at night the service stops working. Please don't waste your money on this monitor. We will be returning tomorrow.
it's not very reliable app

Works well. then after a few days you will get a message saying you have been locked out for 30 seconds. you have 2 more trys . or says your session has expired. then the log in screen appears and you can not log in and the message about being locked out for 30 seconds appears again.

Camera will not stay connected and live stream baby. The app freezes in sync mode and I have to restart the app and camera. At night, it's the worst. I should have done more research and not went with this camera.

Not reliable as the camera frequently doesn't connect which is very frustrating. Haven't been able to use audio unit and tried multiple times to reinstall app and reconnect. Love the idea of a wifi based monitor however this has major connectivity improvements needed. Very unhappy, do NOT recommend.

app is trash. auto records and no way to record on demand. Taking it back tonight. the device itself has a junk sensor for light and dark. clearly light in the room and it goes into night vision mode.

This camera is complete garbage. Doesn't work most of the time, and when it does, there is a major delay (30 seconds or more) a good portion of the time. False motion / noise alerts regardless of sensitivity levels (nobody home, still triggers). Really a terrible product. Wish I could return.

Love it

Terrible app. How is a new parent supposed to get sleep between taking care of babies and the 100 notifications this app sent the 1st night home. Not user friendly to set up, still struggling to decide if the product should be returned.

The alerts and the bed side speaker work great but the camera keeps losing signal with the app and it the only way i have been ablr to get it back is powering down the camera and powering back on which is a rediculous. Hope it gets better.

Live streaming doesn't function This camera over all does not function as described. The app itself doesn't function as it is supposed to. Not worth the money or hassel. No tech support available outside of regular business hours. Should have 24 hour tech support Overall I would give a zero out of 5 stars
Very good
Great app

Overall does what it advertises to do.  Sometimes takes ages to connect to wifi even with fast internet.  I find the only thing that helps is closing the app entirely and trying again.  The audio unit cuts in and out randomly so not always reliable.  The nice thing is that it doesn't constantly play sound so you only hear baby when he cries or makes noise to the level you set.  I wish the recording setting was something you could turn off and on.  Somedays it records, others it doesn't.  It was a gift for us, we used the standard baby monitor until our son was 8 months old

So far so good. Setup was really easy and quick. Not an issue there. Only possible drawback so far is the time it takes to connect. Usually only about 15 seconds but could get irritating. I really like the audio unit, though. It means I don't have to be looking at my phone all the time
Will not connect to wifi no matter what I try

Hopefully it gets better! Seams like this video monitor can be great......but needs all the freezing and no audio bugs to get fixed!!!! Could use improvement all around. We got it to see our 19 month old sleep, as the Doctor thinks she has epilepsy, because it has only happened 2times after napping. But I'm sure it can only get better as they get it fixed up!

I would give it a better rating if I could get it to stop recording 50 
videos a day that I have to delete. No joke, 145 videos in the last 2.5 
days.
Amazing app i would recommend it to any and all parents.
Good
Won't connect to hotspot...app will not forward.

I think there's a fair number of features missing.    1. If my phone disconnects from the camera there is no notification that camera signal is lost.  While I'm awake this is fine, because I can hear the white noise.  At night when I'm sleeping, I'll have no idea the app is no longer working.     2. It can take awhile for the app to reconnect to the camera after my phone switches access points.  Maybe I'm impatient, but, it seems that I sometimes have to restart the app in order for it to connect to the camera.   3. The notifications are always on (I haven't found a way to turn them off without disabling them completely), so if my son wants to play in his room during the day I'm bombarded by constant sound/noise notifications.   4. I have auto-rotation turned off for my display.  There's no way to see the video full screen without enabling it.  Most video apps I have used have a way to make the video full screen without rotating the phone.   5. I wish there were more settings for the "audio unit".  I want to make it always play the audio feed.  I don't have high faith that the audio unit is always connected, so this would help me trust it.

I love the fact that the monitor provides a large view of my son's room. I 
love that it records when my son wakes up and moves around at night. I 
would give it 5 stars, but the audio frequently cuts out, through the audio 
unit as well as on the app. I've reached out to support, but I have to 
heard anything back yet. The audio unit seems to have trouble staying 
connected as well. Right now I'm using our old monitor to have a consistent 
audio function. If it's an easy fix, I'll update my review. Update: there 
is no known audio fix. And it regularly crashes. Maybe it's just how old my 
phone is, but it seems to crash every time I open it.

Works ok but needs more options like recording length and motion/sound 
timeout
Works great, easy to setup and very good camera resolution.

The monitor and app are great.  Easy to set up, easy to manage alerts and alert sensitivity.  I enjoy being able to go back and see the recorded moments to know what all night party my kid was having.  I would definitely recommend the safety first system.
